xc:entity.rdvocab:performerNarratorAndOrPresenter: Metropolitan Opera Madrigal Singers (Christine Weidinger, soprano ; Shirley Love, mezzo-soprano ; Nico Castel, tenor ; Robert Schmorr, tenor ; Gene Boucher, baritone ; Richard Best, bass).
xc:entity.rdvocab:placeAndDateOfCapture: Recorded Sept. 19, 1974, St. Paul's Episcopal Church, Cleveland Heights, Ohio.

xc:entity.dcterms:title: Simple gifts
xc:entity.dcterms:description: Notes on container ; program notes and texts ([2] p.) by J. Freeman inserted.
xc:entity.dcterms:tableOfContents: Simple gifts : Shaker hymn / [Joseph Brackett] -- Sumer is icumen in / Anon., 14th cent. -- To the shady woods / Thomas Tomkins -- What if I never speede / John Dowland -- Thus saith my Cloris bright / John Wilbye -- Now is the month of maying / Thomas Morley -- O magnum mysterium / Tomas Luis da Vittoria -- Nowel syng we / Anon., 15th cent. -- Remember o thou man / Thomas Ravenscroft -- Dormi, o bel bambin / Anon. -- Die Zauberflöte overture / Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart -- Un jour vis un foulon / Roland de Lassus -- Veux-tu, compère Grégoire / M.A. Charpentier -- Ojos morenos ; Não me firays, madre / Juan Vasquez -- Chi la gagliarda / Baldassare Donato -- L'humor svegghiato ; Applauso / Orazio Vecchi -- Vergine gloriosa / Luca Marenzio -- Contrappunto bestiale / Adriano Banchieri.
